attributes.action: Make nepotism in the Houses of Commons and Lords illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After information coming into the public domain about MPs 'employing' their family members and friends to carry out work for them for ridiculous sums of money - and being unable to prove that the work was being carried out - we, the British public, believe that nepotism within both Houses of Parliament should be made illegal.  

Forthwith, a 'temping agency' should be created - paid for out of the public purse - whereby fully trained secretarial/administration staff are available for any member wishing to use their services.

Employment of family members/friends should be made illegal, punishable as prescribed by the judicial system
